allow: Bash(dotnet script eval "using System.Reflection; var asm = Assembly.LoadFrom\(System.IO.Path.Combine\(Environment.GetFolderPath\(Environment.SpecialFolder.UserProfile\), "".nuget/packages/microsoft.openapi/2.3.0/lib/net8.0/Microsoft.OpenApi.dll""\)\); foreach \(var t in asm.GetTypes\(\).Select\(t => t.Namespace\).Distinct\(\).OrderBy\(n => n\)\) Console.WriteLine\(t\);")

Bash(powershell -NoProfile -Command '$dllPath = Join-Path $env:USERPROFILE "".nuget\\packages\\microsoft.openapi\\2.3.0\\lib\\net8.0\\Microsoft.OpenApi.dll""; $asm = [System.Reflection.Assembly]::LoadFrom\($dllPath\); try { $types = $asm.GetTypes\(\) } catch [System.Reflection.ReflectionTypeLoadException] { $types = $_.Exception.Types | Where-Object { $_ -ne $null } }; $types | ForEach-Object { $_.Namespace } | Sort-Object -Unique')

Bash(powershell -NoProfile -Command '$dllPath = Join-Path $env:USERPROFILE "".nuget\\packages\\microsoft.openapi\\2.3.0\\lib\\net8.0\\Microsoft.OpenApi.dll""; $asm = [System.Reflection.Assembly]::LoadFrom\($dllPath\); try { $types = $asm.GetTypes\(\) } catch [System.Reflection.ReflectionTypeLoadException] { $types = $_.Exception.Types | Where-Object { $_ -ne $null } }; $types | Where-Object { $_.IsPublic } | ForEach-Object { $_.FullName } | Sort-Object')

Bash(powershell -NoProfile -Command '$dllPath = Join-Path $env:USERPROFILE "".nuget\\packages\\swashbuckle.aspnetcore.swaggergen\\10.1.0\\lib\\net10.0\\Swashbuckle.AspNetCore.SwaggerGen.dll""; $asm = [System.Reflection.Assembly]::LoadFrom\($dllPath\); try { $types = $asm.GetTypes\(\) } catch [System.Reflection.ReflectionTypeLoadException] { $types = $_.Exception.Types | Where-Object { $_ -ne $null } }; $types | ForEach-Object { $_.Namespace } | Sort-Object -Unique')
